clinical_study.brief_title: Colonoscopy Motivation for Patients With Positive Immunochemical Fecal Test
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of a Motivational Phone Call Strategy to Improve Colonoscopy Participation, for Patients With a Positive Immunochemical Fecal Test : Colofit + Study
clinical_study.source: Association pour le Dépistage Organisé des Cancers dans le Rhône

brief_summary.textblock: Patients with an immunochemical fecal test positive, have to undergo a colonoscopy. Around 10% doesn't realize the colonoscopy. This study evaluate the impact of a motivational phone call (given by a doctor) to improve colonoscopy participation. And try to understand why this patients don't want to make this examination.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of phone call until the date of first documented colonoscopy assessed up to 6 months
primary_outcome.description: Colonoscopy done six months after our phone call

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Reasons for rejecting colonoscopy will be assessed during the phone call only, and assessed until the end of this phone call
secondary_outcome.description: we will ask to patients why they don't realized their colonoscopy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of phone call until the date of first documented colonoscopy result assessed up to 6 months after phone call
secondary_outcome.description: number of cancer and adenoma detected during colonoscopy

arm_group.description: Personnalized motivational phone call, done by a medical physician

intervention.description: Personnalized phone call, done by the medical student in the name of Adémas-69, organized cancers screening in the Rhône area association. This is a motivational call to encourage patients with an immunochemical fecal test positive, to realized their colonoscopy.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- immunochemical fecal test positive but no colonoscopy performed despite a full sequence of reminder (3 letters)
Exclusion Criteria:
- colonoscopy done

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Association pour le Dépistage Organisé des Cancers dans le Rhône
